name: University of Michigan School of Dentistry
description: The University of Michigan School of Dentistry is the dental school of the University of Michigan, located in Ann Arbor, Michigan. It is one of the leading dental schools in the United States, with a long history of excellence in education, research, and patient care.
offers: Doctor of Dental Surgery
Doctor of Dental Science
Master of Science in Dentistry
Specialty programs in Endodontics, Orthodontics, Periodontics, and others

Specialty programs in Endodontics, Orthodontics, Periodontics, and others
